title: Electric-Van Maker Workhorse Is Being Investigated by the Justice Department, Documents Show
sub_head: Inquiry adds to an SEC probe and comes after the company changed management, suffered production setbacks
body:
The Justice Department has opened an investigation into electric-van startup Workhorse Inc., according to documents reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
The focus of the inquiry, which the U.S. attorney’s office in Manhattan is conducting, wasn’t revealed in the documents.
